body:
I find `Shape` more useful to expose utility methods such as `byteSize`. 

Since it is more flexible for future usage, I think it would make sense to standardize its usage everywhere (at least in the building API), I have a personal preference for that. And auto-generated operators actually accepts shape in argument as `Shape`s. Wdyt?
body_html:
I find Shape more useful to expose utility methods such as byteSize.

Since it is more flexible for future usage, I think it would make sense to standardize its usage everywhere (at least in the building API), I have a personal preference for that. And auto-generated operators actually accepts shape in argument as Shapes. Wdyt?
body_text:
I find Shape more useful to expose utility methods such as byteSize.
Since it is more flexible for future usage, I think it would make sense to standardize its usage everywhere (at least in the building API), I have a personal preference for that. And auto-generated operators actually accepts shape in argument as Shapes. Wdyt?
